about_the_game:
Start the game with this free DLC of one (1) of every item in the game!

Also included is three (3) Promised Rings, a special item that gives a huge boost in affection for any bachelor you give it to.

Please make sure to update to the latest version of the game to use this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: Full Service is an adult game on Boys Love with adult themes and sexual acts between two men. These may also include abuse, implied drug use, and non-consensual acts. Please be advised not to play if such situations are not suitable for you.

detailed_description:
Start the game with this free DLC of one (1) of every item in the game!

Also included is three (3) Promised Rings, a special item that gives a huge boost in affection for any bachelor you give it to.

Please make sure to update to the latest version of the game to use this DLC!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)

name: Full Service - Starter Items Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/07/08/10
  • Processor: Pentium III 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 8MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: (Disk Space is for DLC only, please check main game for full specs)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/07/08/10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 16MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

short_description: Provides a set of gift items to use for a Full Service playthrough.
